column4: Im also trying to install ubuntu and im gettin a problemo when I start it the orange "loding bar" goes side to side and I click install ubuntu but then it spazz's out and the screen messes up and orange dots are everywhere and there anre like 3 half bars now and it freezes
and I have tried to install in safe graphics mode as well no luck :/
At start or install press F6 and remove Quiet and Splash from the command line. If it still fails repeat and add noapic acpi=off before the --
